narrative:
No non-compliant items were identified during this Pre-License #1 inspection.
Applicant is ready to be licensed as a Class C Exhibitor. 
Applicant will send the license fee and a copy of this report to the Raleigh office:

Applicant understands that no regulated activity may be conducted until license is issued.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility owner.
